part-1.-novid_des: Skips the startup movie when launching {g}, going directly to the main menu.
part-1.-perfectworld_des: Launches {g} in Perfect World mode, intended for players in China.
part-1.-console_des: Enables the developer console within {g}, allowing input of debug commands.
part-1.-language schinese_des: Sets the {g} interface language to Simplified Chinese, but keeps English voice-overs.
part-1.-high_des: Sets the CPU priority of the {g} process to high, which may improve {g} performance.
part-1.+fps_max 60_des: Limits the maximum frame rate of {g} to 60 frames per second.
part-1.-tcp_des: Forces {g} to use the TCP protocol for network connections, useful for resolving UDP connection issues.
part-1.-udp_des: Forces {g} to use the UDP protocol for network connections, which is the default setting.
part-1.-dev_des: Enables developer mode, unlocking additional debugging features.
part-1.-enable_addons_des: Allows the engine to load custom content within the {g} folder and replace VPK files.
part-1.-override_vpk_des: Allows the engine to search for custom content within the {g} folder and replace VPK files. Using this may affect matchmaking functionality.
part-1.-nomicsettings_des: Prevents {g} from modifying microphone output values, useful for players using other voice software.
part-1.-map dota_des: Pre-loads the map at startup, reducing loading times when entering {g}.
part-1.-32bit_des: Runs {g} in 32-bit mode, suitable for older systems or hardware.

part-2.cn-harmony_des: Changes black blood to red blood and aligns some skill/item icons with the international version.

about.title: About
about.description: {D} is a smart launch tool designed specifically for {} players. It allows you to quickly manage {g} launch options and provides customizable functional modules, helping players get into the battlefield quickly and unleash their competitive potential.
about.author: Developers
about.blurb: {D} is a professional {} launcher, providing convenient {g} management and optimization features.
